description: People say it gets better with more plays, so lets hope so. I've only had a few so far, therefore, I will wait til I have 10 plays to rate it firmly.

title: Such a gre...
description: Such a great game! Excellent Solo puzzles and the expansions add so much to it! The worker placement + combos toward the end are really satisfying.

title: + Mechanic...
description: + Mechanically a fun and streamlined design+ Gorgeous Art and Components- Too reliant on lucky card draws especially at the game start- The resource management aspect of the game is too loose- Slightly too long for the amount of depth it offers- Provides very little reason to concern yourself with your opponents and their turns

title: Cute fores...
description: Cute forest critters theme. Draft buildings and critters to play onto your tableau. Different sets can earn you goals worth VPs. Cards are also worth points. Worker placement mechanic in order to do any action other than playing a card from your hand. Some cards make other cards free (i.e. the Farm allows for the free play of a Man/Woman critter); otherwise, all cards have a resource cost.

title: This game ...
description: This game is junk - it is all visual.  The game has so many weird design choices - like why put the goal cards on the tree when they are so small no one card read them?  I played one four player game and felt that I saw everything the game had to offer.Very disappointed with this one.

title: Amazing an...
description: Amazing and beautiful worker placement, resource management and card game. Art is beautiful, the mechanisms are spot on, and the fact that you can do your actions at your own pace is just brilliant. Loved playing this.

title: Gameplay i...
description: Gameplay is fun and the artwork is amazing

title: Weight: 2....
description: Weight: 2.38 / 5Includes Clay pots for resourcesIncludes Treasure Chest for CoinsIncludes Seashell for Pearlbrook pearlsIncludes Twigs replaced with real stick bundles

title: Rating bas...
description: Rating based on 1st play, which was quite enjoyable. Artwork is great, albeit the text is VERY small. Too small to my liking (but [perhaps I'm just getting old). Would like to play this some more and am still considering adding this one to the collection.

title: Cute theme...
description: Cute theme, great components, nice presentation and really fun to play
